si.title: රට තුළ වියළි කාලගුණයක් තිබේ
body_lines: කාලගුණ විද්යා දෙපාර්තමේන්තුව පැවසුවේ අද උෂ්ණත්වය බටහිර හා දකුණු පළාත්වල මෙන්ම රත්නපුර දිස්ත්රික්කයේ ද දැකිය හැකි බවයි.
සබරගමුවා සහ බටහිර පළාත්වල සමහර කොටස් වල, හිම පතනය උදෑසන දක්නට ලැබේ.

en.title: There is a dry weather in the country
body_lines: The Department of Meteorology said that the temperature will be seen today in the Western and Southern Provinces, as well as in the Ratnapura district.
In some parts of Sabaragamuwa and the Western Provinces, snowfall is seen in the morning.

In the sea regions, from the east direction to the northeastern direction in the sea, from Mannar to Kankesanthurai, Trincomalee, Pottuvil and Hambantota, at a speed of 20 to 30 km / h, the other sea regions are southwest of the country.

summary_lines: Dry weather in the country. Temperature checks in Western and Southern Provinces, Ratnapura. Morning snowfall in Sabaragamuwa and Western Provinces. East to northeast sea regions from Mannar to Hambantota at 20-30 km/h.
